data.title: Solid Greek food
data.text: Nice place huge menu. The classics are solid. Sizes large enough to share. Good bread and a Full bar. Opa!

data.title: great greek food
data.text: very well done greek food, the sausage and Peppers is excellent as well as the gyros. Great atmosphere and helpful service

data.title: Nice Variety of Good Greek Food
data.text: This is a nice Greek restaurant in an upscale strip maul. It has indoor seating with a bar and outside seating as well.  The restaurant is neat and clean with a friendly staff.  There is a good variety of Greek dishes that are Very Good, but I hold back 5 Star ratings for Exceptionally Good, which this was not.  The portions are satisfying and my wife and I came away pleased with the service and the meal.

data.title: OK at best
data.text: Food is not bad, but the service can vary greatly.  The gyro meat is very good.  The price is a little expensive is you get anything but lettuce.

data.title: Good Greek food
data.text: Service is always a little unpredictable here but food is usually quite good. We usually drop in for lunch and enjoy the Greek salads and hummus. The falafel pitas and chicken gyros pitas are also very good. The pita bread is always warm and soft and the lettuce, tomatoes, and onions are always fresh. Nothing too fancy and not very expensive but always enjoyable.

data.title: Favorite restaurant in Rowlett
data.text: We love Greek food and Opas always delivers.  This restaurant is our favorite in the city.  Every dish has been fresh and delicious. The Chicken Souvlaki Platter is wonderful. My husband and I have been going to Opas from the first week they opened and it has continued to improve the food and drink offerings. The atmosphere is casual and friendly.

data.title: Hour and a half for dinner....ugh
data.text: OK food.  Aweful service.  Too the hubs there for his first Greek food experience.  We were there for an hour and a half!!!!  Very bad service.  My food was OK, my husbands was not good at all. Prefer Yanni's in Murphy over this place.  Sad because I live in Rowlett and love Greek food!

data.title: Toast this restaurant
data.text: The food didn't seem very interesting on the first visits I made to this restaurant, but it seems a lot better now.  The owner is the son of Greek American parents and says his recipes are authentic.  I don't know, but the Greek potatoes are to die for as well as stuffed olives, but the falafel balls are wrapped inside a pita instead of being put inside of the pita, and it almost chokes me, but then I don't like pita or flour tortillas.

data.title: It was Ok
data.text: not my favorite Greek restaurant in the Metro-plex but it was ok. Service was good. Kbobs were just so-so. A little on the dry side. Have not been back.

data.title: Well done!
data.text: Great food, nice servers who work in tandem.  It's nice to see a restaurant where any waiter who sees an empty glass or a dish that could be removed, offers to do it.  So many restaurants confine the guests to one waiter/waitress and so the customer suffers.  Opa's is great.  The service was excellent and the food was outstanding.

data.title: Opas upss
data.text: I went there for lunch service was very slow.We had hummus like a appetizers with pita bread it was ok,But we order gyro platter  the lamb was kind dry on that sauce.We give another try.

data.title: Opaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa......
data.text: I like Greek food always have. This restaurant serves a great meal, and does it in style. The sampler dish here is in order, as you will get a taste of the menu!  If you like Greek, go here!

data.title: Good but not great
data.text: Small Greek restaurant that is fine but a little expensive for what you get. Service was nice but not overwhelming. If you like Greek, I'm sure you could find this acceptable.

data.title: Fun and interesting menu
data.text:
We don't know any at all about Greek food but we enjoyed our experience here at Opa's.  The waiter helped us with the menu and made suggestions based on what meats we like, and we truly had a very good meal.
It was really crowded but that is a good thing for a restaurant!  We will be back to try other entrees.
